definition: difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]

sentences.english: In this paper, we brief the basic principle of multiple wavelengths ADI that is also called fractional fringe measurement.
sentences.chinese: 超外差測量還能夠實現合成波長相位的實時檢測。

sentences.english: Now the methods to measure nano is: ICP capacitance micrometer, x-ray interferometer, heterodyne Laser Interferometer, measurement of SPM.
sentences.chinese: 提出了採用聲光頻移器的全光纖外差測距方法。

sentences.english: The Doppler frequency can be obtained as a heterodyne or beat effect.
sentences.chinese: 由於外差或頻差效應，能夠得到多普勒頻率。

sentences.english: Both an RF power analyzer and a spectrum analyzer are essentially specialized superheterodyne receivers.
sentences.chinese: 功率分析儀和頻譜分析儀都本質上都是超外差接收機。

sentences.english: In this paper the potential for measurement of water Brillouin scattering with heterodyne lidar is studied.
sentences.chinese: 該文分析外差激光雷達測量水體布里淵散射的可行性。

sentences.english: Using this CO2 laser, the experiment of three-frequency heterodyning is suooefully carried out.
sentences.chinese: 利用該激光器，成功地進行了三頻外差測量研究。

sentences.english: Lastly, the best receiving aperture of a laser heterodyne receiver is discussed briefly.
sentences.chinese: 最後簡單討論了激光外差接收機的最佳接收口徑。

sentences.english: In this paper a new processing method of laser heterodyne signals of vibrations is reported.
sentences.chinese: 本文報導了一種新型的振動激光外差信號處理方法。

sentences.english: Most of the wireless receivers used so far are based on a heterodyne architecture.
sentences.chinese: 傳統無線接收機大多爲超外差接收機。
